item.title: Diary of a Game: Part 0 - Genesis
item.description: Here is the first screenshot of a new game I’m working on - awesome eh? Wait, don’t walk away! It’ll get better, I promise! I’ve spent the last 23 years working in the games industry and at various points I’ve attempted to muster the motivation/energy to create a game in my spare time. Only one of those (a simple iPhone game, no longer available) made it through to the end and even that took way too long.
